content: Ruy López de Segura, a priest and a famous Spanish chess player of the 16th century, wrote a book of 150 pages, called Libro del Ajedrez, about exhaustive studies he made on the opening (1. e4 e5 2. ♘f3 ♘c6 3. ♗b5) that is named after him.
translations: ita:Ruy López de Segura, un prete e un famoso giocatore di scacchi spagnolo del XVI secolo, ha scritto un libro di 150 pagin
